entry.title: My Validators
entry.content:
As G-dot Staking I am providing validators on Polkadot and Kusama on professionally handled and maintained infrastructure. I am currently maintaining two validators, one on Polkadot and one on Kusama. The nodes are held on professional setups with 24/7 monitoring and alert functions.

Kusama Nodes

  • Name: JUST JONAS/1
  • Stash: DPdkDRzUV56F5R8fNjZwFx2Uctn173c1UJJXjxQMVMZuCqS

Polkadot Nodes

  • Name: JUST JONAS/1
  • Stash: 153Fz22gxQP8HM8RbnvEt9XWsXu9nR8jxZC2MbQFmuKhN62f
entry.summary: As G-dot Staking I am providing validators on Polkadot and Kusama on professionally handled and maintained infrastructure. I am currently maintaining two validators, one on Polkadot and one on Kusama. The nodes are held on professional setups with 24/7 monitoring and alert functions.
